metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9015 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.34 and 7.x before 7.34 allows remote attackers tohijack sessions via a crafted request, as demonstrated by a crafted requestto a server that supports both HTTP and HTTPS sessions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.32-1+deb8u3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.32-1+deb8u3').
